column1: Section:PL-Real Estate Management, Lease Management (6 Reqs)

column4: Integrate with ERP accounts payable for external lessors to automatically generate payment request and create warrant for lease  payment based on specified lease terms.
Allocate costs associated with lease payment based on cost allocation terms documented in the lease inventory.
Allow authorized user to request a hold on lease payment.

Submit any on-hold lease payments to an authorized user for approval through an automated work flow and generate payment  request and create warrant or intergovernmental billing following user approval.
Generate notification to Real Estate Division and/or agencies based on user defined business rules where lease is expiring.
Generate a report of facilities where lease is expiring with time period based on user defined business rules.
